Class Deck

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List, java.util.Queue
 class Deck
extends Pile

Deck represents a standard deck of playing cards with all the cards you'd expect except jokers Deck is a special type of Pile which can be cut and shuffled

Author:
Ben Francis and Sam Black
See Also:
Pile

Constructor Detail

Deck

public Deck()
Constructor creates a Pile and adds four suits of 13 cards

Method Detail

Cut

public void Cut()
Splits the deck at a random position and inverts the two halves. This method could be more elegant if we could edit linked list pointers directly.

PrintDeck

public void PrintDeck()
Prints the whole deck to the screen for testing purposes

Shuffle

public void Shuffle()
Randomly re-arranges the Cards in the deck
